attributes.action: MP’s salary should only increase in line with all public services salary.
attributes.background: MPs consistently give themselves a pay rise above that of public sector workers we want a fair pay rise across the board, we want all public sector workers including MP’s to have the same pay rise and we want to stop MP’s from awarding themselves a higher pay rise then other public sector workers.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
